title: Taishou Otome Otogibanashi
synopsis: Tamahiko Shima is the youngest son of the powerful and wealthy Shima family. Blessed with great fortune since his childhood, he grew up wanting nothing but affection from his oftentimes distant family.
characters: ['Tachibana, Yuzuki', 'Shima, Tamahiko', 'Shima, Tamako', 'Atsumi, Ryou', 'Shiratori, Hikaru', 'Shiratori, Kotori']
